sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { gsap } from 'gsap'; import GridMotion from '../components/GridMotion'; const VehicleSignwriting: React.FC = () => { const headingRef = useRef(null); const contentRef = useRef(null); const ctaRef = useRef(null); // Mix of signage images for GridMotion (no specific vehicle images yet) const vehicleImages = [ '/signboards/signboard1.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting1.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement1.jpg', '/signboards/signboard2.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting2.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement2.jpg', '/signboards/signboard3.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting3.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement3.jpg', '/signboards/signboard4.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting4.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement4.jpg', '/signboards/signboard1.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting1.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement1.jpg', '/signboards/signboard2.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting2.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement2.jpg', '/signboards/signboard3.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting3.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement3.jpg', '/signboards/signboard4.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting4.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement4.jpg', '/signboards/signboard1.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting1.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement1.jpg', '/signboards/signboard2.jpg', ]; useEffect(() => { const tl = gsap.timeline({ defaults: { ease: 'power4.out' } }); tl.fromTo( headingRef.current, { opacity: 0, scale: 1.2, filter: 'blur(20px)' }, { opacity: 1, scale: 1, filter: 'blur(0px)', duration: 1.4, delay: 0.2 } ) .fromTo( contentRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 50 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 1 }, '-=0.8' ) .fromTo( ctaRef.current, { opacity: 0, scale: 0.9 }, { opacity: 1, scale: 1, duration: 0.8 }, '-=0.4' ); }, []); const services = [ { title: 'Full Wraps', description: 'Complete vehicle transformation with premium vinyl wraps', accent: 'from-red-500 to-pink-600' }, { title: 'Partial Graphics', description: 'Strategic placement for maximum impact and value', accent: 'from-purple-500 to-indigo-600' }, { title: 'Fleet Branding', description: 'Consistent identity across your entire vehicle fleet', accent: 'from-blue-500 to-cyan-600' }, { title: 'Magnetic Signs', description: 'Removable signage for multi-purpose vehicles', accent: 'from-green-500 to-emerald-600' }, { title: 'Window Graphics', description: 'One-way vision films and privacy window branding', accent: 'from-orange-500 to-amber-600' }, { title: 'Reflective Vinyl', description: 'High-visibility safety markings and graphics', accent: 'from-yellow-500 to-orange-600' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* GridMotion Background */}
{/* Dynamic Overlay */}
{/* Top Blur for Header */}
{/* Content */}
Mobile Advertising

VEHICLE SIGNWRITING

Your brand, everywhere it goes

Transform your vehicles into powerful mobile billboards. Professional vehicle graphics that turn every journey into a branding opportunity, reaching thousands daily.

View Services Get Design Mockup
{/* Animated Bottom Gradient */}
{/* Services Grid */}
What We Offer

Comprehensive Vehicle
Graphics Solutions

{services.map((service, index) => (
{/* Gradient accent on hover */}
{String(index + 1).padStart(2, '0')}

{service.title}

{service.description}

Learn More
))}
{/* Stats Section */}

The Numbers
Tell the Story

Vehicle graphics deliver unmatched advertising value. Your brand gains exposure with every mile driven, converting commutes into campaigns.

{[ 'Premium 3M and Avery vinyl materials', 'Computer-cut precision graphics', '5-7 year outdoor durability guarantee', 'Professional application & removal' ].map((point, idx) => (

{point}

))}
{[ { value: '70K+', label: 'Daily Impressions', gradient: 'from-purple-500 to-pink-500' }, { value: '96%', label: 'Brand Recall', gradient: 'from-pink-500 to-red-500' }, { value: '£0.03', label: 'Cost Per View', gradient: 'from-red-500 to-orange-500' }, { value: '∞', label: 'ROI Potential', gradient: 'from-orange-500 to-yellow-500' } ].map((stat, idx) => (
{stat.value}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Final CTA */}
{/* Animated gradient orbs */}

Ready to Hit
The Road?

Let's transform your fleet into a moving masterpiece. Free design consultation and quote for all vehicle signwriting projects.

Get Started Today
); }; export default VehicleSignwriting;
